articles.title: Congratulations to PM of Lesotho
articles.content:
Congratulations to PM of Lesotho 
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK Prime Minister Choe Yong Rim sent a congratulatory message to Thomas Motsoahe Thabane Thursday on his appointment as prime minister of Lesotho. 
					 The message wished him success in his responsible work for stability and socio-economic progress of the country. 
					
					 It expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the future.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Technological Updating at Chollima Steel Complex
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Technological Updating at Chollima Steel Comple
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, made a field survey of the technological updating at the Chollima Steel Complex. 
					 He learned in detail about the progress made in the construction project at the site alive with a high-pitched drive for applying the high temperature air combustion technology through the anthracite gasification. Then he convened a consultative meeting.
					
					 The meeting underscored the need for the related units to ensure a timely production and supply of items of cooperative production and discussed the issue of completing the technological updating by Korean style under any circumstances.
					
					 It also took measures for stepping up the modernization of the dressing process at the Posan Iron Works and making a satisfactory supply of raw materials needed for production. 
					
					 In the meantime, the premier toured various places of the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm making a positive contribution to improving the people's living standard after its successful completion. He underlined the need to raise the rate of the work done by machines in fruit cultivation and settle the issues arising in the transportation and storage of fruits in a responsible manner.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Union Solidarity and Development Party, Union of Myanmar paid a visit to the DPRK embassy in its country to observe the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Members of the delegation including a member of the Executive Committee of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party, Union of Myanmar laid a floral basket in the name of the party before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Participants in Pyongyang Int'l Insurance Seminar Leave for Home
articles.content:
Participants in Pyongyang Int'l Insurance Seminar Leave for Home
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Hammam Badr, secretary general of the Federation of Afro-Asian Insurers and Reinsurers, flew back home Thursday after taking part in the Pyongyang International Insurance Seminar.
					 Departing here Friday were delegates and delegations of companies of Russia, , Switzerland, Britain, India, China and Tanzania.
					
					 The delegation of the Kumgang Insurance Co., Ltd. of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan left here earlier.

articles.title: Meeting Held to Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Meeting Held to Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Pyongyang on Friday to mark the 12th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 Joint Declaration.
					 Attending it were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly who is honorary co-chairman of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, Kim Yang Gon, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party, Choe Jin Su, chairman of the North Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification, Kang Ji Yong, secretary of the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea, and officials of working people's organizations and religious bodies and members of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and the North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, and the North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification and Pyongyangites, Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the An
					
					 ti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, and overseas compatriots.
					
					 Kim Ryong Song, chairman of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, in his keynote speech said that leader Kim Jong Il provided the north-south summit, the first of its kind in the history of national division in June 2000 and saw to it that the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration was adopted, adding that it is an exploit to be specially recorded in the history of the Korean nation.
					
					 The adoption of the joint declaration provided the Korean nation with a programme for reunification clearly indicating the basic principle and goals for settling the issue of Korea's reunification and the ways to realize them.
					
					 Kim Jong Il once again provided the north-south summit in October 2007 and made sure that the October 4 declaration was adopted, ushering in a new heyday of the development of the north-south relations and peace and prosperity.
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un is the sun of the nation and lodestar of national reunification as he is leading all Koreans, holding them in his arms with his exceptionally broad magnanimity, generosity and noble benevolent politics and all-embracing politics, he said.
					
					 He called for remaining true to Kim Jong Un's leadership, bearing in mind the firm faith that the cause of national reunification is sure to be achieved as long as the Koreans are under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He emphasized the need to once again fully revive the spirit of national independence, the hot wind of national unity and the desire for reunification and patriotism that prevailed in the June 15 era and rise as one in the sacred struggle to wipe out to the last man the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors who are totally negating the north-south joint declarations and going reckless in the moves to escalate confrontation and ignite a nuclear war.
					
					 Then, solidarity messages and congratulatory messages from south Korean and overseas organizations were introduced at the meeting.
					
					 An appeal to the Koreans at home and abroad was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Appeal to All Koreans at Home and Abroad Adopted on Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Appeal to All Koreans at Home and Abroad Adopted on Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- An appeal to all Koreans at home and abroad was adopted at a meeting held here Friday to mark the 12th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in the appeal called upon all Koreans at home and abroad to revive the June 15 era of reunification this year at any cost and open up a new landmark phase for peace and reunification of the country. 
					
					 The historic June 15 joint declaration is a precious legacy of reunification and patriotism left to the Koreans by leader Kim Jong Il who devoted his all to the great unity of the nation and national reunification during his great revolutionary career, the appeal said.
					
					 It stressed the need to hold higher the banner of the joint declaration, prioritize the fellow countrymen and the common interests of the nation and fling open the gate to reunification by letting the Koreans pool strength and wisdom. 
					
					 It, at the same time, called for courageously combating all sorts of confrontation theories and removing obstacles to the implementation of the joint declaration, carrying forward the course of visits, contacts, dialogues and cooperation provided by the June 15 joint declaration and decisively rejecting outside forces' domination and interference. 
					
					 It called for intensifying the nationwide actions to frustrate joint military drills against the DPRK and arms buildup pushed forward in all parts of south Korea under various codenames.
					
					 It is necessary to thoroughly foil the attempt to build a tri-angular military alliance for aggression involving the U.S., Japan and south Korea, drive the U.S. forces out of south Korea and root out the source of war in Korea, the appeal noted, and went on:
					
					 It is essential to boost the solidarity among the north, south and overseas sides for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and vigorously promote the great unity of the entire nation. 
					
					 The south Koreans are called upon to completely bury the conservative regime as it ruined the south Korean society and deteriorated the people's living through its unpopular rule, fascist dictatorship, irregularities and corruption. 
					
					 The appeal called upon all Koreans to protect sovereignty, the right to existence and democratic rights and fully support the south Korean people in their just struggle for peace and reunification of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Lauded by Vice-chairman of C.C., AINDF
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Lauded by Vice-chairman of C.C., AINDF
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un is a great lodestar of national reunification and the great unity of the nation as he is possessed of the same noble desire for reunification and firm will for patriotism, broad magnanimity and benevolent virtue of holding all Koreans in his arms as leader Kim Jong Il's. 
					 The vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Anti-imperialist National Democratic Front said this in his statement Friday on the 12th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration. 
					
					 The statement said: 
					
					  Eye-opening events hardly imaginable in the past took place one after another. This is the precious fruition of the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il who made indefatigable devoted efforts for implementing the last instructions given by President Kim Il Sung for national reunification, regarding it as his lifelong mission. 
					
					  Kim Jong Un, possessed of Kim Jong Il's personality as a Heaven-sent great man, is leading the movement of all Koreans for national reunification. 
					
					 The vanguard fighters of the AINDF and people of different social standings will raise a new hot wind of praising the great man, the spirit of following and upholding Kim Jong Un with loyalty just as they advanced the June 15 era of independence and reunification amid the "hot wind of great Kim Jong Il" and thus bring about a landmark phase of national reunification without fail. 
					
					 The cause of national reunification is sure to be accomplished as it is led by Kim Jong Un and the June 15 joint declaration, a brilliant embodiment of Kim Jong Il's patriotism, invariably serves as a milestone of reunification and the compatriots remain unshakable in their will to achieve national reunification without fail, concluded the statement.

articles.title: KCNA's Detailed Report on Completion of Changjon Street Construction
articles.content:
KCNA's Detailed Report on Completion of Changjon Street Construction
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency released a detailed report on Friday in connection with the appearance of a peculiar street of Korean style in the area of Mansudae where the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il stand.
					 Standing in line in the street are the People's Theatre, skyscrapers and multi-storied apartment houses and various welfare and service facilities which fully meet the requirements of the Workers' Party of Korea's Juche-based idea of architectural beauty and the new century. They were put on the basis of formative art and unique parks were created. 
					
					 In hearty response to a grandiose blueprint for the construction of the capital city unrolled by Kim Jong Il, service personnel and people of the DPRK waged a high-pitched labor drive, completely removing the old traces of the area. They created such new Pyongyang speed and worked such miracle unprecedented in the history of construction as building the street of fashionable style in a matter of a year.
					
					 It was the noble desire of Kim Jong Il to build Pyongyang into the capital of a thriving nation based on the revolutionary outlook on the leader. 
					
					 It was thanks to Kim Jong Il's idea of loving the country and its people that a grandiose design was worked out to build the street as a gift for the people in the run-up to the centenary of the birth of the President. 
					
					 Based on Kim Jong Il's noble outlook on the leader, the people and the younger generation, the construction of the street made rapid progress, opening up a new phase in the construction of streets in the new century, completely away from the existing mode of construction. 
					
					 Service personnel, builders and members of shock brigades succeeded in flattening the old street and building new sites for it in a matter of 20 odd days. 
					
					 They fully displayed the iron will that Korea does what it determined and a high-pitched drive was under way to turn anything impossible into possible. 
					
					 A theatre was successfully built to be a property of people and a monumental edifice in the era of Songun in the run-up to the centenary of the birth of the President. 
					
					 Along with public buildings hundreds of welfare and service facilities including the Children's Department Store, Haemaji Restaurant, Wedding Restaurant and a laundry made their appearances to match the modern style of the street.
					
					 Every arrangement was made to operate them right after their completion. Foodstuffs, fittings and utensils were provided to them.
					
					 A signal innovation was effected in greening the area in an effort to decorate the street in a peculiar manner. 
					
					 Monumental edifices that seem to cheer the statues of the President and Kim Jong Il, beautifully decorated vast parks and brightly lit skyscrapers and other buildings present an epic representation of the wise leadership of the peerlessly great men who opened a new history of the construction of the capital city and their profound love for the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits for Party Building Praised by Workers and Trade Union Members
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits for Party Building Praised by Workers and Trade Union Members 
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) held on Friday a seminar in South Phyongan Province to mark the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Read out at the seminar were treatises on the greatness of Kim Jong Il who performed great exploits for building the party with his outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and seasoned and experienced leadership. 
					
					 Those who took the floor were Kim Kwang Sik, editor-in-chief of the Working People's Organizations Publishing House, Hong Song Hyon, department director of the GFTUK Central Committee, Ri Pyong U, chairman of the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex Committee of the GFTUK, and Jong Ki Bok, chairman of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the GFTUK.
					
					 They said Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into an eternal party of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It is the greatest honor for the WPK, state, army and people of the DPRK to hold Kim Jong Il as eternal general secretary of the WPK, they stressed.
					
					 They called for carrying forward to completion the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt. Paektu through generations holding the dear respected Kim Jong Un as first secretary of the WPK.
					
					 They also called on workers and members of the trade unions to glorify Kim Jong Il's leadership exploits for party building and strive for prosperity of Songun Korea united close around the WPK Central Committee headed by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Memorial Service for Ex-President of ITF Held
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Ex-President of ITF Held 
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- A memorial service to mark the 10th anniversary of death of Choe Hong Hui, ex-president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation (ITF), took place at the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in the suburbs of Pyongyang Friday. 
					 Present at the service were Jang Ung, president of the ITF; Han Chun Hui, widow of late Choe Hong Hui; and her party, a delegation of the ITF, overseas Koreans staying in the socialist homeland and bereaved family members. 
					
					 Also present at the service were Ryu Mi Yong, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Chondoist Chongu Party; Kim Kyong Ho, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee; Kim Jin Guk, director of the Bureau of Service for Overseas Compatriots; officials concerned and Taekwon-Do instructors and players. 
					
					 The participants laid wreaths in the name of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, ITF, the Bureau of Service for Overseas Compatriots, Committee for Aiding Overseas Compatriots of Korea and individuals, bouquets and flowers at the grave of Choe Hong Hui before paying silent tribute to him.
					
					 Then there was a briefing on his career.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize Closes
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize Closes
						
 Pyongyang, June15 (KCNA) -- The Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize closed with due ceremony in Nampho on Friday. The contest opened on June 3 to mark the 75th anniversary of the victory in the Pochonbo battle.
					 Men footballers of the Ri Myong Su Sports Team and women footballers of the Amnokgang Sports Team won the titles and men players of the April 25 Sports Team and women players of the Amnokgang Sports Team took the first place in volleyball matches. Men players of the Pyongyang Railway Bureau Sports Team and women players of the Waudo Sports Team respectively came first in the field hokey events and men and women players of the April 25 Sports Team in the boxing events.

articles.title: DPRK to Compete in Group C in 2012 U-20 Women's World Cup
articles.content:
DPRK to Compete in Group C in 2012 U-20 Women's World Cup
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea belongs to Group C together with Argentina, Canada and Norway, according to the drawing results for the 2012 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup.
					 It will meet Norway on Aug. 20, Argentina on Aug. 23 and Canada on Aug. 27.
					
					 16 nations are to compete for the world cup.
					
					 Quarterfinals are scheduled for Aug. 30-31, semi-finals Sept. 4 and finals Sept. 8.
					
					 The DPRK was the runner-up in the 2011 U-19 Asian Women's Football Championship. It finished first in the 2006 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup and second in 2008.
					
					 The DPRK girls are stepping up preparations for the tournament, having matches with teams of different countries.

articles.title: Short-neck Clam Cultivation in DPRK
articles.content:
Short-neck Clam Cultivation in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- A fresh success has been made in seaside short-neck clam cultivation in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 A technology of breeding seed clams was introduced on tidelands on the west coast of the country.
					
					 Dr. Ri Hae, deputy director of the Branch Academy of Fishery, told KCNA:
					
					 "We succeeded in artificially spawning spats, one of the processes for short-neck clam cultivation. The seed clams are cultivated in open-air ponds and seaside breeding grounds.
					
					 We have also built the process of mass-producing sea algae to solve the problem of food for short-neck clams."

articles.title: Service Personnel Encouraged by Kim Jong Un's Treatis
articles.content:
Service Personnel Encouraged by Kim Jong Un's Treatise
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's treatise "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" has hardened the will of the servicepersons to play the role of standard-bearer in accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					 Paek In Song, an officer of the Korean People's Army, told KCNA:
					
					 "Kim Jong Un is the supreme incarnation of obligation and preeminent thinker-theoretician as he provided important guidelines that make our army and people confidently advance toward the building of a thriving country under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 It is a high honor and pride of the KPA to have him as its supreme commander.
					
					 We, servicepersons, will intensify the training as the anti-Japanese guerrillas did in Mt. Paektu and become a unit of comrades-in-arms of the Supreme Commander, who share blood and life on the road of the Songun (military-first) revolution.
					
					 As the driving force of the revolution intensely loyal to the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea, the KPA will smash any aggression forces at one blow with arms of Mt. Paektu."
					
					 Ri Sok, a soldier, said:
					
					 "In his treatise Kim Jong Un stressed that the Korean army and people should invariably go along the road of independence, the road of Songun and the road of socialism, indicated by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, under any circumstances.
					
					 With the idea of the treatise kept in my mind, I'll be always faithful to my mission as a soldier defending justice."
					
					 Another soldier, Song Hui Suk, said:
					
					 "The Songun politics serves as an ever-victorious treasured sword that firmly guarantees a victorious advance of the socialist cause of Juche.
					
					 I will devote myself to safeguarding Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un and cementing the single-minded unity of the DPRK, an asset of Kim Il Sung's nation, Kim Jong Il's Korea, more precious than hundred million tons of gold."

articles.title: Government Officials Vow to Follow Kim Il Sung's Popular Traits
articles.content:
Government Officials Vow to Follow Kim Il Sung's Popular Traits
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's treatise titled "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" has made officials of ministries and national institutions in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea harden their will to learn from the popular traits of President Kim Il Sung and apply them in their activities.
					 Kim Jong Chol, an official at the Ministry of Land and Environmental Conservation, told KCNA:
					
					 "The treatise elaborates on the greatness of President Kim Il Sung as leader for the people.
					
					 The President had always found himself among the popular masses to share bitters and sweets with them from the beginning of his revolutionary activities to the last moments of his life. He treated the popular masses as the master of history and put their dignity above anything else for the first time in history.
					
					 Regarding it as his maxim to believe in the people as in Heaven, he pursued the politics centered on the masses, whereby the DPRK could develop into an invincible socialist power."
					
					 Jo Yong Chol, an official of the Secretariat of the Cabinet, said:
					
					 "The treatise tells about what kinds of attitude, viewpoint and style of work an official should take towards popular masses.
					
					 I will become a faithful servant who sincerely works for the people with the noble outlook on them, the view of giving top priority to their interests and convenience."
					
					 Kim Hui Jo, department director of the Ministry of Foodstuff and Daily Necessities Industry, said:
					
					 "Believe in the people and rely on them at all times and you shall always emerge victorious; if you are forsaken by them, you will always fail. This is the immovable truth of history.
					
					 In his lifetime, the President regarded the people as his teacher and himself as a son faithful to them.
					
					 I will do many good things for the people by following the personality of the President."

articles.title: North Hwanghae Province of DPRK Severely Affected by Drought
articles.content:
North Hwanghae Province of DPRK Severely Affected by Drought
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Most areas of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, North Hwanghae Province in particular, have experienced a long spell of drought.
					 Crops are withering due to the drought most serious in 60 years.
					
					 According to data available, the drought has ravaged 15 percent of the province's maize fields, leaving more than 2 000 hectares of fields sterile.
					
					 Hit hardest by the lingering drought in the province are Hwangju, Sohung, Yonthan and Suan counties and Songrim City.
					
					 In the province hundreds of thousands of people have turned out every day to overcome the drought, along with tractors, lorries, water pumps, sprinklers and other means.
					
					 In all likelihood, it is hard to expect harvest of wheat, barley and potato in the province.

articles.title: Papers Call for Dynamically Advancing along Road of Independent Reunification
articles.content:
Papers Call for Dynamically Advancing along Road of Independent Reunification 
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday editorially calls upon all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad to meet the anti-reunification forces' challenge and dynamically advance the June 15 era of reunification under the uplifted banner of the north-south joint declaration with fresh faith.
					 The editorial says:
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration serves as a banner for the country's reunification in the 21st century as it comprehensively deals with the idea and principles of the north-south agreements in the past period including the July 4 joint statement and developed them as required by the situation.
					
					 "By our nation itself," the main spirit of the declaration, is the patriotic idea indicating the road of national independence and great unity.
					
					 The publication of the June 15 joint declaration provided the compatriots with immortal guidelines for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country at an early date by concerted efforts of the nation and the might of great unity.
					
					 More than a decade since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration was a period in which the vitality and validity of the declaration were clearly proved and all Koreans learned truth that the preservation and implementation of the declaration assure national reunification and a bright future of the nation. 
					
					 All the compatriots, sympathetic with truth and justice of the idea of "By our nation itself," have dynamically spurred the advance of the movement for national reunification, while rejecting foreign aggressor forces' domination and interference with great national pride and self-respect and firm independent spirit. 
					
					 An admirable era was opened to solve the issue of the country's reunification by the concerted efforts of Koreans at a time when the trait of giving priority and importance to the nation and the nation-first spirit were prevailing in the land of Korea.
					
					 There took place such eye-opening events that a breakthrough was made in the barrier of division and confrontation that has stood for more than half a century and the road of travel was opened in the sky, land and seas. The north and the south pooled their intention and efforts while bravely overcoming differences for meeting their common purpose.
					
					 The solidarity and unity among the pro-reunification movement organizations at home and abroad grew stronger, leading to the birth of the All-Korean Committee for Implementation of the June 15 Joint Declaration, a nation-wide solidarity organization of the reunification movement, and remarkably increasing the driving force for the country's reunification.
					
					 Minju Joson editorially says that there still lie obstacles and difficulties in the way of the struggle to implement the June 15 joint declaration, but no force can break the nation's will for national reunification.

articles.title: Inter-Korean Declarations Serve as Milestone for Independent Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Inter-Korean Declarations Serve as Milestone for Independent Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it, serve as a milestone indicating the way for accomplishing the cause of independent reunification of Korea in the 21st century.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The joint declarations clarify the independent stand of the Korean nation to solve all the issues arising in accomplishing the cause of national reunification with the nation responsible for it, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 "By the Korean nation itself", the idea of national independence, has served as mental nutrition for all Koreans at home and abroad in their efforts to advance the movement for national reunification along the orbit of independence without the slightest deviation.
					
					 In the course of embodying the idea, the Korean nation came to have the firm conviction that the implementation of the joint declarations is the only way of thoroughly rejecting outsiders' interference in the issue of Korea's reunification and achieving independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 The inter-Korean declarations paved a wide avenue for Koreans to pool their wisdom and strength irrespective of ideology and social system.
					
					 Differing ideologies and social systems have existed within the Korean nation for decades. However, the implementation of the joint declarations helped wipe out mistrust and misunderstanding and unprecedentedly give momentum to the atmosphere of reconciliation and unity. 
					
					 The Koreans have keenly realized in practice that there is nothing impossible for the north and the south if they get united close for national reunification under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration. Through this the Koreans came to have conviction that there is no reason whatsoever for the north and the south to live separated from each other and stand in confrontation and that they can surely achieve unity and reunification when they place the interests common to the nation above anything else irrespective of all differences.
					
					 Solidarity and alliance have grown stronger than ever before among the reunification movement organizations in the north, south and abroad based on the idea of "By our nation itself" and the movement for national reunification has turned into a nationwide patriotic movement. This provides a guarantee for solving the issue of the country's reunification by concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					 Entirely just is the patriotic struggle being waged by all Koreans to preserve and carry out the joint declarations after defining their implementation as a target of actions common to the nation.
					
					 Unquenchable is the desire of all Koreans to support and implement the joint declarations.

articles.title: S. Korea Stages Large Military Exercise
articles.content:
S. Korea Stages Large Military Exercise 
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- South Korean warmongers Friday staged a large mobile exercise in the area of Paekryong Island, according to KBS in south Korea. 
					 Latest war equipment including MLRS deployed after the shelling on Yonphyong Island and more than 4 000 marines were mobilized in the exercise one year after the formation of the Command for Defense of Islands in Northwest Sea. 
					
					 They fired shells in the exercise allegedly aimed to prevent "infiltration" from the DPRK. 
					
					 The warmongers said that they would deploy more weapons to monitor and strike the DPRK in the air 10km above five islands in the West Sea of Korea by the end of this year.

articles.title: S. Korea Announces Plan of "2012 Hwarang Drill"
articles.content:
S. Korea Announces Plan of "2012 Hwarang Drill" 
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The puppet south Korean Phohang Specified Guard Region Command on June 13 announced its plan to stage "2012 Hwarang drill" in the areas of Phohang and Kyongju from June 18 to 22, according to south Korean Yonhap News. 
					 To be involved in the drill are police forces, administrative organs and civilians including the First Division of the puppet Marine Corps,  the sixth carrier flotilla of the Navy and educational training group of the Marine Corps. This is reportedly aimed to increase the coordinated defense capability and military operational capability in the rear areas.
					
					 The puppet forces openly disclosed their sinister intention, saying that there will be movement of troops and vehicles, joint use of checkpoints on major roads by the army and the police, the use of blank shots and mobilization of reserve forces. 
					
					 They also clarified they would put an emphasis on establishing efficient and close information sharing system among relevant institutions by putting communications means to effective use.
					
					 The warmongers frequently hold drills for an actual war to put the scenario for a war against the DPRK into practice, pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korea Plan Joint Naval Drill for Preemptive Attack on DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korea Plan Joint Naval Drill for Preemptive Attack on DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Naval forces of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and south Korean puppet army are mulling staging joint naval drill in the West Sea of Korea from June 23 to 25, according to south Korean Internet newspaper Thongil News.
					 The warmongers did not hide that the drill targets the DPRK, saying the U.S. extra-large nuclear-powered carrier George Washington would be involved in it.
					
					 They also plan to stage joint naval drill with Japan's SDF in waters around Jeju Island from June 21 to 22.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet warmongers are getting more desperate in saber-rattling for mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK, going against the strong desire of the public at home and abroad for peaceful reunification of the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: People's Condemnation of GIs' Killing of Schoolgirls Reported by S. Korean Internet Radio
articles.content:
People's Condemnation of GIs' Killing of Schoolgirls Reported by S. Korean Internet Radio
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet radio Voice of People aired an article on Tuesday on the lapse of 10 years since Sin Hyo Sun and Sim Mi Son were mercilessly killed by an armored car of U.S. imperialist aggressor troops in south Korea. 
					 The article recalled the two girls studying at the then Joyang Middle School were driven over by an armored car of the engineering corps of the 2nd Division of the U.S. forces on June 13, 2002. 
					
					 There were clear traces of the car moving forward and backward on their bodies from their heads to their feet, the article said, adding this was the intentional murder by the GIs. 
					
					 The U.S. forces side should have probed the truth behind the killing and punished the criminals, but it declared the killers not guilty, asserting at a hearing there were dead girls, but there was no killer, it said, and went on:
					
					 Members of civic and social organizations formed the "All-People Measure Committee against the Killing of Schoolgirls Late Sin Hyo Sun and Sim Mi Son by U.S. Forces' Armored Car" and conducted activities in demand of the probe into the truth behind the murder case, open apology and punishment of those responsible. 
					
					 From then ceaseless candlelight actions have been staged by people from all walks of life including workers, students, youth and children and women in condemnation of the murder of them by GIs and in demand of withdrawal of the U.S. forces and in memory of the two schoolgirls in front of the 2nd Division of the U.S. forces. 
					
					 Shouts of slogans "U.S. forces, bring Hyo Sun and Mi Son back to life!" and "Amend SOFA" triggered off by the murder of two schoolgirls are still heard from all parts of south Korea including Kwanghwamun of Seoul.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Group Accused of Its Racket for "Eliminating Forces Following North"
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Group Accused of Its Racket for "Eliminating Forces Following North"
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued information bulletin No. 1001 on Friday.
					 The south Korean puppet regime has been thrown into utter discomfiture in the wake of the release of the DPRK's open questionnaire disclosing the truth behind the farce staged by the conservative group for "eliminating the forces following the north", the bulletin said, and went on:
					
					 Those who were hit home by the questionnaire are vying with each other to make absurd excuses, claiming that "they did nothing problematic during their visits to the north" and "they made only friendly remarks, much less uttering any pro-north words."
					
					 Even spokesmen for the "Ministry of Unification" and the "Saenuri Party" cried out for a halt to the "interference" in the argument on "eliminating the forces following the north" while talking about "threat" and "sparking of internal conflict".
					
					 This is nothing but a ridiculous deed of those feeling guilty and sheer sophism let loose by those who are tight-cornered as the proverb "A wicked man is his own hell" says.
					
					 The racket is, in essence, not only a grave provocation and insult to the DPRK but also part of the moves to escalate confrontation against reunification as it disregards fellow countrymen and totally denies the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 As this is a crucial issue, we can never overlook the ruckus. 
					
					 The outbursts let loose by them urging the DPRK not to "meddle" in their racket while perpetrating provocations to it, blinded with confrontation, remind one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 The conservative group's assertion that its clan did nothing problematic during their visits to the north is a sheer lie. 
					
					 At that time they took our hands and said they were supportive of the joint declaration and everything could be solved if we cooperated with them. But now they are feigning ignorance of them and kicking up a noisy racket for confrontation with fellow countrymen in collusion with the anti-reunification forces. And they went the lengths of making a drumbeat for eliminating the above-said forces. All this fully reveals the group's shameless, mean and despicable nature.
					
					 The south Korean public is now demanding the group speak truth in reply to the open questionnaire issued by the north.
					
					  The conservative group including the "Saenuri Party" should clarify its outlook on the north and fellow countrymen and its stand on the inter-Korean relations before arguing about "forces following the north".
					
					 We will never pardon those who hatch sinister plots, talking about "forces following the north," be they who represent the ruling or opposition camps. The nosier the conservative group gets in its racket despite our warning, the deeper it will find itself in the pitfall dug by itself and this will bring it nothing but a shameful end. It should bear this in mind.

articles.title: Probe into Truth about S. Korean Authorities' Illegal Investigation into Civilians Demanded
articles.content:
Probe into Truth about S. Korean Authorities' Illegal Investigation into Civilians Demanded 
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Buddhist Jogye Order demanded the "government" authorities thoroughly probe the truth behind their illegal investigation into civilians, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 Members of the leadership of the order on June 12 visited the Seoul District Prosecutor's Office in demand of a strict inquiry into the illegal investigation into high-ranking members of the order by the general planning section for supporting the ethics of the officials under the office of the "prime minister".
					
					 After forming a measure committee against the illegal investigation, the organization held a press conference at which it demanded the "government" make an apology for the illegal action.

articles.title: Memorial Service for Two Slain Schoolgirls Held in Seoul
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Two Slain Schoolgirls Held in Seoul
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- A memorial service for Sin Hyo Sun and Sim Mi Son who were mercilessly killed by an armored car of U.S. forces in south Korea ten years ago was held before the "Taehan Gate" of the Deogsu Palace in Seoul on Tuesday.
					 Speakers at the service said that still burning are the candlelights held high to condemn the GIs who killed the two schoolgirls on a roadside on June 13, 2002.
					
					 The GI criminals are still at large on the strength of the unequal south Korea-U.S. "Status of Forces Agreement" (SOFA), they deplored.
					
					 They accused the conservative media of floating misinformation that "progressive forces are using the memorial service for Hyo Sun and Mi Son for their political purpose" and working hard to bar civic and social organizations of different circles from holding memorial services.
					
					 They declared that they would stage dynamic actions to prevent south Koreans from facing the same tragic fate as Hyo Sun and Mi Son did and enable the people to live as human beings with legitimate rights.
					
					 A similar event took place on the scene of the killing of them in Hyo Chon-ri, Kwangjok-myon, Yangju city, Kyonggi Province on Wednesday in demand of the revision of the unequal SOFA, the withdrawal of U.S. forces from south Korea, etc.

articles.title: Foreign Media Praise June 15 Joint Declaration as Milestone for Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Foreign Media Praise June 15 Joint Declaration as Milestone for Korea's Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Newspapers, radios and Internet websites of different countries observed the 12th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration between June 4 and 8.
					 The Bangladeshi newspaper Natun Katha in an article titled "Historic milestone for Korea's reunification" said that the publication of the declaration marked a historic event that brought about a signal turn in the Korean nation's movement for reunification. 
					
					 The declaration is a landmark for Korea's reunification supported and admired by the world, the paper added.
					
					 The Nepalese newspaper Arpan in an article titled "June 15 for reunification" noted that reflected in the words are the unshakable will of the Korean nation to achieve national reunification at any cost under the banner of the joint declaration.
					
					 To aspire after the June 15 joint declaration precisely means reunification and to deny it means conflict and war, it stressed.
					
					 Radio broadcastings of Cambodia elaborated on how the first north-south summit in the history of the nation's division was held in Pyongyang in June 2000 and the inter-Korean declaration was adopted by leader Kim Jong Il's plan for the country's reunification.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its Internet website an article praising the exploits performed by Kim Jong Il for national reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Russian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Website of Russian Organization
						
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Young Communist League of Russia on June 10 posted on its Internet website the detailed content of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "On Effecting a Drastic Turn in Land Management to Meet the Requirements for Building a Thriving Socialist Nation".
					 The work, published on April 27, 2012, clarifies the undying exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in land management and indicates the general orientation and tasks for face-lifting the country's land as befitting a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The website carried a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un making a speech at the joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) organizations in celebration of the 66th anniversary of the KCU.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK Central Committee Marked in Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK Central Committee Marked in Democratic Congo
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Democratic Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association issued a bulletin on June 7 to mark the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The bulletin carried articles titled "Exploits for national reunification", "Kim Jong Un, great sun of the Korean nation", etc. under the headline of "The 48th anniversary of great leader of the Korean people Kim Jong Il's start of work at the WPK Central Committee".
					
					 The WPK developed into an invincible party in which the leader, the party and the masses are a harmonious whole under the banner of Kimilsungism thanks to the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Il for nearly half a century. The party has steadily advanced along the road of victory weathering all sorts of trials and difficulties, the article said.
					
					 Kim Jong Il authored many works, proving the truth of socialism and the inevitability of its victory and pursued Songun politics, consolidating Juche Korea as an impregnable stronghold, it added.
					
					 The bulletin said Kim Jong Il provided the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration to open a broad road for achieving national reunification by the nation's own efforts free from interference of outside forces.
					
					 Referring to the work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche" written by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the bulletin said that he in his work set forth important guidelines for further developing the WPK into an ever-victorious party and dynamically speeding up the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: Korean People Are Sure to Accomplish Revolutionary Cause of Songun: Overseas Organizations
articles.content:
Korean People Are Sure to Accomplish Revolutionary Cause of Songun: Overseas Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Brazil and France posted special write-ups on their Internet websites to mark the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Worker's Party of Korea.
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea on June 4 carried articles titled the "Historic declaration", "Immortal programme", etc.
					
					 An article titled "Library of the revolution and construction, encyclopedia" said that Kim Jong Il steadily developed the Juche idea with his energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 Another article titled "Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism" noted that Kim Jong Il provided an invincible treasured sword for realizing the human cause of independence by developing the Songun idea.
					
					 The French Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Idea on June 5 carried an article titled "Great succession to the revolutionary cause of Songun".
					
					 The article said that the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by President Kim Il Sung had been successfully carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il. The Korean people will brilliantly accomplish the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche, united close around the dear respected Kim Jong Un, it added.
					
					 The Nepalese newspaper Charcha carried a special write-up with a portrait of Kim Jong Il on June 4.
					
					 The paper in an article titled "Kim Jong Il's exploits in building WPK" said that the biggest exploit performed by Kim Jong Il is that he turned the WPK into a party, a transparent integral whole in thinking that has achieved unity and cohesion, and a genuine mother party that serves the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Myanmar Political Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Myanmar Political Figure
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Aung Thein Lynn, member of the Central Executive Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party, Union of Myanmar, issued a statement on June 8 to observe the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Kim Jong Il wisely led the WPK and the army and the people of the DPRK with his original idea, outstanding leadership and noble virtues, performing undying feats for the country, revolution, times and history, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 His distinguished feat is that he perfectly settled the issue of the inheritance of leadership for the destiny of the country and the people and the future of revolution.
					
					 The Korean people, holding the dear respected Kim Jong Un in high esteem as their supreme leader, will push forward the building of a thriving nation and national reunification, steadily advancing toward the rosy future along the road indicated by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Premier coreano visita el Complejo de Acero Chollima
articles.content:
Premier coreano visita el Complejo de Acero Chollima
						
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Choe Yong Rim, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, visito el Complejo de Acero Chollima para averiguar en el terreno el estado de reconstruccion tecnica.
					  Se informo en detalles de como marcha la obra para aplicar en la produccion la tecnologia de combustion de aire en alta temperatura mediante la gasificacion de antracita.
					
					  En la reunion de consulta convocada por el se debatieron varios problemas, tales como las unidades relacionadas deben producir y suministrar a tiempo los productos necesarios a la modernizacion tecnica del complejo y cumplir esta tarea por el estilo coreano.
					
					  Se tomaron las medidas para acelerar la modernizacion del sistema selector de la Fundicion de Hierro de Posan y proveer en lo suficiente de las materias primas necesarias a la produccion.
					
					  Por otra parte, el premier recorrio varios puntos de la Granja Fruticola Combinada Taedonggang, que contribuye al mejoramiento de la calidad de vida del pueblo, destacando la necesidad de elevar el porcentaje de mecanizacion en los trabajos de huerta y resolver con responsabilidad los problemas surgidos en el transporte y el almacenamiento de frutas.

articles.title: Tiene lugar mitin por 12o aniversario de Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur
articles.content:
Tiene lugar mitin por 12o aniversario de Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur
						
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este viernes en esta capital el mitin conmemorativo del 12o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio. 
					A la ocasion asistieron el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y copresidente honorario del Comite Norteno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, Yang Hyong Sop, el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Yang Gon, el presidente del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea, Kim Yong Dae, el presidente de la Direccion Nortena de la Alianza Pannacional para la Reunificacion de la Patria, Choe Jin Su, el jefe del Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria, Kang Ji Yong, los funcionarios de las entidades de masas y las religiosas, los miembros del Comite Norteno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, los de las direcciones nortenas de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria y la Alianza Pannacional de la Juventud y los Estudiantes por la Reunificacion de la Patria, los trabajador
					
					 es capitalinos, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, Jo Il Min, el vicepresidente de la direccion surena de la APRP, Ro Su Hui y otros compatriotas en ultramar. 
					
					El presidente del comite norteno para la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, Kim Ryong Song, dijo en su discurso basico que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il preparo en junio de 2000 la Cumbre Norte-Sur de Corea por primera vez en la historia de la division nacional y aprobo la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio, lo cual es la proeza a ser registrada en letras mayusculas en la historia nacional. 
					
					Gracias a la publicacion de dicha Declaracion, la nacion coreana pudo tener el programa de reunificacion que aclara los principios fundamentales, la meta y los remedios para resolver el problema de reunificacion, dijo y continuo: 
					
					En la segunda Cumbre Norte-Sur celebrada en octubre de 2007 el Dirigente aprobo la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y abrio la nueva era de prosperidad para el desarrollo de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas, la paz y la prosperidad. 
					
					El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un es el sol de la nacion y salvador de la reunificacion de la patria quien con gran magnanimidad practica la noble politica abarcadora y de beneficios.
					
					Se debe apoyar con fidelidad la direccion del Maximo Dirigente con la ferrea conviccion de que gracias a el se realizara sin falta la causa de reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Todos los coreanos deben revitalizar el espiritu de independencia nacional y el fervor por la unidad nacional y la reunificacion de la era del 15 de Junio y levantarse en la sagrada lucha por eliminar a la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak que niega totalmente las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur y acarrea el nubarron de la confrontacion y la guerra nuclear. 
					
					Se dio lectura a las palabras de solidaridad y de felicitacion enviadas por las entidades del Sur de Corea y del extranjero hacia el mitin.
					
					En la ocasion fue aprobado el llamamiento a todos los compatriotas dentro y fuera del pais.

articles.title: Aprobado llamamiento a todos coreanos en Norte, Sur y en ultramar
articles.content:
Aprobado llamamiento a todos coreanos en Norte, Sur y en ultramar
						
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- En el mitin conmemorativo del 12o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio, que tuvo lugar este viernes en esta capital, quedo aprobado el llamamiento a todos los compatriotas dentro y fuera del pais. 
					El comite norteno para la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio exhorto en la nota a revitalizar este ano la era de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio y abrir una nueva coyuntura favorable a la paz y la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					La historica Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio es la noble herencia patriotica del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien durante toda su vida revolucionaria se dedico por la gran unidad nacional y la reintegracion territorial del pais, destaca el documento e insiste en la necesidad de dar prioridad a la nacion y a los intereses comunes de la nacion sosteniendo en lo mas alto la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y lograr la reunificacion con las fuerzas e inteligencias de nuestra propia nacion. 
					
					Y llama a rechazar todas las teorias y obstaculos que impiden la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur, reiniciar sin falta las visitas, contactos, dialogo y cooperacion preparados por la publicacion de este documento y frustrar la dominacion y las intervenciones de toda indole de las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					Hay que avivar las llamas de la lucha pannacional contra los ejercicios conjuntos militares anti-RPDC y el aumento armamentista que se desarrollan en toda la extension surcoreana, apunta. 
					
					Prosigue que es necesario hacer anicos la intencion de establecer la alianza militar tripartita EE.UU.-Japon-Sur de Corea, expulsar a las tropas norteamericanas del suelo surcoreano y eliminar en la tierra patria la fuente de la guerra.
					
					Deben ampliar la solidaridad tripartita entre los compatriotas en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar para la ejecucion de dicha Declaracion Conjunta y promover la gran unidad de toda la nacion, asevera. 
					
					Al mismo tiempo, deben sepultar completamente al "poder" conservador que llevo a la fase catastrofica la sociedad surcoreana y la vida de la poblacion practicando las politicas antipopulares, la dictadura fascista, las irregularidades y corrupcion, subraya.
					
					Por ultimo, exhorta a toda la nacion a apoyar la justa lucha de la poblacion surcoreana por defender la soberania, el derecho a la vida y los derechos democraticos y lograr la paz y la reunificacion del pais.

articles.title: ACNC publica informacion sobre la finalizada obra de avenida Changjon
articles.content:
ACNC publica informacion sobre la finalizada obra de avenida Changjon
						
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- En relacion con que se ha construido una avenida original al estilo coreano en la zona de Mansudae, donde estan erguidas las estatuas de bronce del Presidente     Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea hizo publica el dia 15 la informacion detallada al respecto.
					En la avenida Changjon, se construyeron magnificamente, segun la idea del Partido del Trabajo de Corea sobre la autoctona belleza arquitectonica y la demanda del nuevo siglo, el Teatro del Pueblo, rascacielos, apartamentos multiplantas y establecimientos de servicios publicos que satisfacen los requisitos figurativos, artisticos y de reforestacion senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					De acuerdo con el ambicioso proyecto de la construccion urbana presentado por el Dirigente  Kim Jong Il, los uniformados y civiles coreanos desplegaron una intensa ofensiva para renovar por completo la zona de Mansudae y crearon asi la nueva velocidad de Pyongyang con que realizaron el milagro de construir en un ano esa avenida perfecta. 
					
					Fue noble deseo del Dirigente convertir la ciudad de Pyongyang en la capital de gran potencia prospera donde sea materializada la concepcion revolucionaria del lider.
					
					  Gracias a su ideal caracterizado por el amor por la patria y el pueblo, se preparo el diseno de esa avenida a ser regalada al pueblo con motivo del centenario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					  La construccion de la avenida Changjon, donde fue materializada la noble concepcion del Dirigente sobre el lider, el pueblo y las generaciones venideras, se desarrollo con impulso superando los metodos anteriores y explorando el nuevo plano de edificacion de las avenidas del nuevo siglo.
					
					  Los militares, los constructores y los miembros de la brigada de construccion removieron la anterior avenida en mas de 20 dias y sentaron la base de reconstruccion.
					
					  Con la fe de que si Corea decide, lo cumple, se libro la gran batalla para convertir lo imposible en lo posible. 
					
					Con motivo del centenario del natalicio del Presidente, el Teatro del Pueblo fue inaugurado para el disfrute del pueblo como otra creacion monumental de la epoca del Songun.
					
					Ademas de los edificios publicos, se  levantaron ciento y decenas de facilidades de servicio publico como el Almacen para Ninos, el Restaurante Haemaji, el de bodas y la tintoreria.
					
					Terminaron perfectamente los preparativos de servicio, como materias primas y utilidades de cocina, para iniciar la operacion en cuanto fuera terminada la construccion.
					
					Tambien, se registraron innovaciones en la formacion de areas verdes que dieron un aspecto singular a la avenida Changjon.
					
					Las creaciones monumentales, que se asemejan a un grupo de esculturas que aclama a las estatuas de bronce del Presidente y el Dirigente, el extenso parque hermoso y la decoracion con lamparillas demuestran la sabia direccion y el gran amor por el pueblo de los grandes hombres que dieron inicio a la nueva historia de la capital.
